trans-unit.source: Acts as a container to a group of activities that is executed when the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> starts running.
trans-unit.target: Atua como um contêiner para um grupo de atividades que é executado quando o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> começa a ser executado.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The StateInitializationActivity acts as a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> to all activities it contains.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]O StateInitializationActivity atua como um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>para todas as atividades que ele contém.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> classes may be included in the StateInitializationActivity.

If a StateInitializationActivity exists in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, the StateInitializationActivity is the first activity that gets executed when the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> starts executing.
trans-unit.target: Se existir um StateInitializationActivity em um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, o StateInitializationActivity é a primeira atividade obtém executado quando o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>inicia a execução.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>

trans-unit.source: In some ways the StateInitializationActivity is like an `OnEnterState` handler.
trans-unit.target: Em alguns aspectos de StateInitializationActivity é como uma `OnEnterState` manipulador.

trans-unit.source: The StateInitializationActivity is not a mandatory activity in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>.
trans-unit.target: O StateInitializationActivity não é uma atividade obrigatória em <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateInitializationActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the StateInitializationActivity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: O StateInitializationActivity é um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, que significa que o StateInitializationActivity pode conter outras atividades.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateInitializationActivity cannot contain any activity that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> interface, which includes all <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> activities and the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: O StateInitializationActivity não pode conter qualquer atividade que implementa o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>interface, que inclui todos os <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>atividades e o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>atividade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: A StateInitializationActivity is executed in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, a non-blocking manner that makes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> ready to receive events.
trans-unit.target: Um StateInitializationActivity é executado no <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, uma maneira sem bloqueio que torna o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>pronto para receber eventos.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateInitializationActivity can contain a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> activity, so that it can model a state machine where transitions occur from state to state without receiving any event.
trans-unit.target: O StateInitializationActivity pode conter um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity>atividade, de forma que ele pode modelar uma máquina de estado em que ocorrem transições de estado para estado sem receber qualquer evento.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity>

trans-unit.source: In that sense the state machine behaves like a sequential workflow.
trans-unit.target: Nesse sentido a máquina de estado se comporta como um fluxo de trabalho sequencial.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity"> </xref> classe usando o nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome definido pelo usuário da atividade.
